Major_Arcs.title: The Case of the Human Meteor and Toby's Stowaway Mission
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and Toby, setting up two parallel storylines: Duke's encounter with G-Men and Toby's infiltration of the Marlin yacht to investigate suspicious activities.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of the Human Meteor and Initial Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the comic and the Human Meteor, setting up the initial conflict with the G-Men and Duke's transformation.

sub_scenes.title: Connecting Threads and Toby's Yacht Infiltration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the aftermath of Human Meteor's actions and transitions to Toby's mission on the yacht Marlin, linking back to the waterfront and playboys.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Marked Depth Chart
Reporting to the Captain and Recognition

Major_Arcs.title: Namor's Underwater Intervention and Yacht Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Namor's response to Toby's findings, his underwater battle with divers, his attack on the ship, and confrontation on the yacht, culminating in the discovery of the depth map and Peter's treachery.

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Underwater Investigation and Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Namor's dive, submarine discovery, and his initial underwater confrontation with the divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Urgent Dive and Submarine Discovery
Underwater Torpedo Operation and Namor's Realization
Targeting the Submarine with a Torpedo

sub_scenes.title: Ship Attack, Yacht Confrontation, and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Namor's shift to attacking the ship, his surface confrontation on the yacht, discovery of the depth map, and eventual escape with Toby and Duke.

narrative_arcs.title: Ship Crew Reacts to Peter's Fate and Geyser
Namor Reaches the Yacht and Confronts the Crew
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Presenting the Depth Map to the Captain

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the Liberty Lads and their confrontation with Nazi spies, leading to the discovery of a spy ring and their takedown with military assistance.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads' Initial Confrontation and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads fighting Nazis and transitions to Skip and Chuck's discovery of the dropped wallet and subsequent investigation.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Attempt to Return Dropped Wallet
Discovery of the Wallet and Bus Company Address
Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Identity
Explanation of Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Mr. Horst and Military Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the boys' encounter with Mr. Horst, their interrogation, Major Bronson's intervention, and the military's arrival to resolve the Nazi spy ring threat.

narrative_arcs.title: Returning the Wallet to the Bus Company
Mr. Horst's Abrupt Arrival and Confrontation
Close-up of Mr. Horst's Menacing Face
Major's Injury and Urgent Medical Aid

Major_Arcs.title: The South American Kidnapping and Rescue of Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows The Champ and Henry's South American adventure, their encounter with army officers, the revelation of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre, and their subsequent rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Encounters and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the scene in South America, introduces the flashback, the hotel encounter with army officers, and the revelation of Rosita's kidnapping.

narrative_arcs.title: Establishment of a South American Town Setting
Hotel Room Standoff and Abrupt Departure
El Tigre's Ransom and Axis Connection
Arrival at the House and Introduction to 'Mama'

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission and Climax
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the plan to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout, the execution of the rescue, the ensuing combat, and the successful freeing of Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
Execution of the Rear Entrance Plan
Machine Gun Threat and Champ's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and the Submarine Detector Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of Devil Dog Dolan, his jungle combat, capture, torture, and ultimate defiance to protect submarine detector plans and rescue Captain Lawton's son.

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Jungle Combat and Captain's Bargain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in action and sets up the central conflict: Captain Lawton's compromised position due to his son's capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Action: Jungle Combat

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Defiance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan's capture, the torture he endures to reveal the plans, his initial compliance, and then his act of defiance through arson.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Justice and Shipboard Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dolan's fight with natives, the chief's demise, and his subsequent shipboard brawl and punishment, highlighting his complex moral actions.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Case of the Murdered Banker
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to uncover racketeering, a blood transfusion crisis, and ultimately justice.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and Murder Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up their new case: the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the Threat
Encounter with the Nurse and Revelation of Sick Girl

sub_scenes.title: Unraveling the Mystery and the Blood Crisis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the Twins' investigation, their suspicions about Barnacci, the revelation of Reilly's daughter's blood crisis, and their search for Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Daughter and the Need for Farnacci's Blood
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Arrival in Irish Section and Reilly Pursuit
Unfruitful Search for Reilly in Irish Section
Encounter with Mrs. Murphy and Revelation of Reilly's Daughter's Plight
Dan Intervenes and Confronts Gunman on Car Roof
Police Arrival and Apprehension of Criminals
Awaiting News and Doctor's Diagnosis at the Hospital
Blood Donation Offer and Compatibility Issue
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Mobilization at Hospital
Blood Type Confirmation and Donor Preparation
The Life-Saving Transfusion and Immediate Revival
Post-Transfusion Observation and Anticipation of Recovery
Planning Farnacci's Capture and Police Pursuit
Forced Blood Donation and Birthday Celebration for Recovery
